titles.en: Chapter 8 – Regarding the ettiquiettes of the birth
Chapter 8 – Regarding the ettiquiettes of the birth

verses.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ الْمُغِيرَةِ عَنِ السَّكُونِيِّ عَنْ جَابِرٍ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ كَانَ عَلِيُّ بْنُ الْحُسَيْنِ ( عليه السلام ) إِذَا حَضَرَتْ وِلَادَةُ الْمَرْأَةِ قَالَ أَخْرِجُوا مَنْ فِي الْبَيْتِ مِنَ النِّسَاءِ لَا يَكُونُ أَوَّلَ نَاظِرٍ إِلَى عَوْرَةٍ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Abdullah Bin Muhammad, from his father, from Abdullah Bin Al Mugheira, from Al Sakuny, from Jabir, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘Whenever a birth for a wife presented itself for Ali<sup>asws</sup> Bin Al-Husayn<sup>asws</sup>, he used to say: ‘Exit the ones from the women out from the house, they would not be the first ones to look at privacy’.
